snippet: Kaizers Orchestra, an idiosyncratic band popular in Europe but hardly known in the United States, will make its American debut in what is also its farewell concert.
abstract: Kaizers Orchestra, idiosyncratic Norwegian band popular in Europe but hardly known in the United States, will play its first--and only--American concert at Metropolitan Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: Kaizers Orchestra, an idiosyncratic band popular in Europe but hardly known in the United States, will make its American debut in what is also its farewell concert.

headline.seo: Kaizers Orchestra at the Metropolitan Museum of Art
headline.main: Band Flies in From Norway to Say Hello and Goodbye
headline.print_headline: Band Flies In From Norway To Say Hello And Goodbye
